Control Name: Assesses Compliance With Confidentiality Commitments of Vendors and Business Partners — On a periodic and as-needed basis, the entity assesses compliance by vendors and business partners with the entity’s confidentiality commitments and requirements.

control_attributes.Control: Assesses Compliance With Confidentiality Commitments of Vendors and Business Partners — On a periodic and as-needed basis, the entity assesses compliance by vendors and business partners with the entity’s confidentiality commitments and requirements.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC9.2 The entity assesses and manages risks associated with vendors and business partners.
